Sept. 13, 1980 D North East Derbyshire District Council Annual Brass Band Festival (Grade Three)
North East Derbyshire District Council Annual Brass Band Festival (Grade Three) 430 Own Choice Test Piece Contest North East Derbyshire District Council Annual Brass Band Festival dronfield-contest-third-section
Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Sports Centre, Dronfield, Derbyshire Prizes - 1st £60 and trophy, 2nd £35, 3rd £25. 8 bands competed. 22nd annual contest.
June 2, 2014, 4:03 p.m. March 30, 2017, 8:16 a.m.
1 Kirkby Colliery Welfare Band Roy Walters
2 Ecclesfield Silver Alan Exley Resurgam
3 Riddings Band W. J. Saint
Unknown Result Shirebrook Band Seth Appleton
Unknown Result Clipstone Colliery Welfare Keith Wardle
Unknown Result Ilkeston Brass Alan Tyler
Unknown Result Staveley Works Band M. Butler
Unknown Result Kingsway Printers Cleethorpes A. Weston
